website_summaries.verdict: A solid, heavy-duty rack that looks great but gets low marks for its ease of assembly.
pros: Metal construction gives it a heavy, sturdy feel
Slim profile in a modern, contemporary look
cons: Assembly of this option can be a bit daunting
Easy to mount, but with its weight, you may wish to aim for a wall stud to screw it into

customer_reviews.title: This would probably only be good for magazines/catalogs
customer_reviews.text: it's not closed in on the back, so unless if you have it flush against something, then things will fall out of the back. It also has a weird little slit on the bottom, so all of my smaller things are falling out of it. This would probably only be good for magazines/catalogs.
customer_reviews.author: April E.

customer_reviews.title: Good For Me!
customer_reviews.text: They were easy to take apart, easy to put together, and are a great addition to my home/remote office. My only complaint would be that once assembled, the files aren't very deep. They don't fit nearly as many files (or as large of files) as I'd like. But great for magazines and smaller, less bulky files. Just a good way to make sure my files are lean!
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: These are made of cheap sheet metal that was warped and scratched before I even assembled it. They're shipped very haphazardly bouncing around in the shipping box. If you want these I'd take a trip to Ikea to make sure you get ones that aren't beat to crap before you even use them.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Why is is so hard to find good white wall organizers like this
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why they bottom of these is open, it just lets stuff fall out. Also, the mounting design could be much easier and effective. Why is is so hard to find good white wall organizers like this. They are metal and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Logan J Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Steel but not enough space
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality steel but the way it’s designed to sit I side of each other leaves limited space for file storage. Cuts it in half almost. So I did t stack them like it’s designed. Looks different than I wanted and still not enough storage space but sturdy and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Ali K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived packaged well and in perfect condition. Easy to assemble and hang. We use them as family mail boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: The device has very small opening when assembled.
customer_reviews.text: The device has very small opening when assembled. The space between each folder is less than 1/4 inch (about 2 standard magazins)
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and modern look
customer_reviews.text: Love the modern style. Easy to assemble and mount. Only wish their weren't holes down the center of the pockets where smaller papers can slip through.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Ward

customer_reviews.title: Organizing family "command center!"
customer_reviews.text: I added this "command center" to my kitchen to help with household paper clutter. I gave each person a slot with a folder and their name. When mail comes in- it goes in the recycle or one of the slots. I also made a "to be paid" bills section. It's slim and sleek profile is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Consuela

customer_reviews.title: Better for magazines than for mail, but still works!
customer_reviews.text: I like this magazine rack (we keep mail in it), but it was not as easy to assemble as most ikea products. The openings at the bottom of each container are annoying because our mail starts to slip through, but since it's meant for magazines, that's understandable. It looks nice on the wall and fit just inside the front door.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte jump

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic organizer!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic organizational tool! This is well build and has the perfect amount of storage space to organize our daily lives. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Organization
customer_reviews.text: These things are heavy, sturdy, stylish and hold a lot of materials. I am using them to hold my 3 year old daughter's art paper, coloring and puzzle books. These are perfect for keeping any paperwork, magazines and art supplies neatly organized.
customer_reviews.author: chadwick007

customer_reviews.title: ... wall makes the bathroom floor clean and magazines are better organized and easy to find
customer_reviews.text: The shelves on the wall makes the bathroom floor clean and magazines are better organized and easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Nilesh

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, does the job, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, does the job, holds plenty of paperwork. Only issues was assembly was a pain, but not enough to dock the rating. Would certainly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately it arrived a little bent. Very difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it arrived a little bent. Very difficult to pull apart. I need more folder width than what these offer
customer_reviews.author: Zulima D.

customer_reviews.title: What were they thinking?
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about how difficult it was to separate the individual bins, but I never dreamed it was impossible! If I could, I'd give it zero stars, since I couldn't tell if it would suit me or not - I couldn't hang them since I couldn't separate them. Someone made a very poor decision on how to package this item.
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Works great for keeping orginized. Seems a little high on the price but not allot of options in this size available.
customer_reviews.author: Honda Dude

customer_reviews.title: Neat and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, perfect for organizing my classes in my classroom. It could of course work well for Magazines!
customer_reviews.author: Ioi

customer_reviews.title: but install was not hard and it looks good on the wall
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple of minutes to figure it out, but install was not hard and it looks good on the wall. Our mail has never been more organized.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, but works well.
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced. Saw it at ikea after I made the purchase and realized this cost me double. In terms of functionality, simple to set up and works per design.
customer_reviews.author: Tou A Chang

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get apart
customer_reviews.text: I like the rack now that it's all assembled. The assembly was not difficult, but getting the slots apart was very difficult. I ended up having to get my brother to come and help get them apart. Now that it is together and on the wall I really enjoy it and it is great for keeping our mail organized.
customer_reviews.author: L. Raymond

customer_reviews.title: It was not easy to put together since it kept popping out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I wouldnt buy this again. It was not easy to put together since it kept popping out of its holes that connect and one the bar that holds the shelves to the wall bend with very little effort
customer_reviews.author: Gina M.

customer_reviews.title: Will work well for the intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a work project, these will work great. As mentioned by others, they are a bit hard to separate, but with just a little encouragement from a screwdriver they came apart nicely. They are made strong and should hold up well. They arrived on time and were packaged well. All in all a nice product for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: whosit

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: They come packaged poorly, but after returning one or two you get a good one. they are pretty well designed and if you want it to be larger later you can rebuy this kit and add on to the one you already have.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Murphy

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: it was exactly at shows on pictures . love it
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Love these shelves, heavy duty materials, they'll last a long time. They were easy to install. Only drawback was no screws included in the shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Littleton

customer_reviews.title: Not so great for mail
customer_reviews.text: I got this to sort my mail but it's really designed to sort folders - the slots are too narrow to easily get the mail out of.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Murphy

customer_reviews.title: does the job, very heavy
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and it does the job, but it's extremely heavy. I would not recommend this if you're just looking for something to hold a few files.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA HASLER

customer_reviews.title: Love this except for the holes in the bottom (can ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this except for the holes in the bottom (can see in the picture). Envelopes and such can slide through.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful on the wall and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful on the wall and very sturdy. My only complain is that it does not provide two screws that can attach it to the wall. I have to run to a hardware store to get it hanged.
customer_reviews.author: moutain explorer

customer_reviews.title: Serves a purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a mail organizer. Aside from the hard to assemble flimsy brackets that break when you apply the needed pressure to attach each tier. My main issue is the holes at the bottom of each pocket that the mail falls through. Also since it does not sit flush to the wall mail will also fall behind the entire assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job of holding all the papers I don't want ...
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of holding all the papers I don't want to deal with at work. Keeps them off my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with packaging or how wedged together they were but once up they do the job and look good as expected
customer_reviews.text: stuck together....not impressed with how difficult they are to pry apart - tool needed. Not impressed with packaging or how wedged together they were but once up they do the job and look good as expected. Star removed due to having to pry them apart which took longer than putting together and up on wall.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zwitzer

customer_reviews.title: space saving wonder shelf
customer_reviews.text: I hate paperwork. So I bought this to get it up off my desk. Unit was fairly easy to assemble once I pried it apart and mounting was easy too. Seems to hold quite a bit of paper/junk.
customer_reviews.author: earnan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't assembled it yet but it seems very sturdy. It will be a space saver and the white on the white wall will keep papers looking tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy J.

customer_reviews.title: Very good item, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: These selves are very sturdy. It’s a great way to stay organized. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Chavero

customer_reviews.title: The shelves are fine once they are put together
customer_reviews.text: The shelves are fine once they are put together, but the assembly was a nightmare. Just getting them apart after taking them out of the box almost gave me a nervous breakdown, they were jammed together so tightly. I had a tough time figuring out how to get them together. I'm glad to have them to use, but had I known how much of a pain they are to put together, I would have found something else.
customer_reviews.author: Trex

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: Is nice just a little hard to put it together, but nothing super difficult
customer_reviews.author: San B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: fine, not as easy to assemble as I would have hoped
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This wasn't what I was hoping for. There is ...
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't what I was hoping for. There is a hole in the bottom of each slot, so you have to be very careful where you put letter sized mail or it will fall through.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a "Command Center" in our kitchen area
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a "Command Center" in our kitchen area. All school papers, bills, mail, coupons etc. are now beautifully organized.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Vandermeer

customer_reviews.title: Great except for getting it apart...really bad way to ship
customer_reviews.text: Would be better if it wasnt so hard to take apart
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LBS of good product
customer_reviews.text: FAIRLY HEAVEY material already PLUS the weight to carry ta boot! so be advised- I would suggest finding a stud to secure this into the wall for the weight.
customer_reviews.author: katie muslin

customer_reviews.title: Classic Ikea
customer_reviews.text: It is Ikea, it helps with organization and it has a streamline look. What more could you ask for?? I mean it is Ikea.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler H. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: but so sturdy and professional looking
customer_reviews.text: pricey, but so sturdy and professional looking! I'm not worried about over filling it - it's hooked to the wall with 2 screws and it's not going anywhere! perfect!
customer_reviews.author: k. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great item - really helped to organize my computer desk ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item - really helped to organize my computer desk in the kitchen area. Got lots of compliments from everyone who noticed it!
customer_reviews.author: Flying Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for work organizer - easy to assemble - one thing they do not send with the screws
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted and expected. Very sturdy and heavy. We are using it for outdoor use to hold brochures, street maps, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Maria

customer_reviews.title: 1 star until i get some help
customer_reviews.text: Just got these, they are jammed so tightly together I cant even separate them. They look completely bent. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dread

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Useful item.. Tad heavy but we found a useful space where it is well anchored
customer_reviews.author: nancy f. burcar

customer_reviews.title: The holes/openings in the bottom are annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble because the pieces were warped. Not worth the price and I ended up hating the design. The holes/openings in the bottom are annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Forest

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. looks perfect. Fits files and magazines. Looks very contemporary. Was very easy to put together and mounts perfect on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: I looks good on the wall and seems sound
customer_reviews.text: I did not put it up myself so I can not speak to that part. I looks good on the wall and seems sound. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: wando

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: EVERYTHING just has to be assembled if it's Ikea, doesn't it? But the quality is very high, nevertheless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Item
customer_reviews.text: This item turned out to be just what my Son needed for his business!!!!!Very Pleased....
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Nice Buy
customer_reviews.text: Got them for a gal at the office, she loves them. Good solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Jared G.

customer_reviews.title: Well built!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well built metal file rack!!!! Holds up to washdowns. The file rack have a think coat of paint that should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: William W.

customer_reviews.title: we bent it back and it looks fine.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived bent but instead of returning it, we bent it back and it looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Aga Artka

customer_reviews.title: dont even think
customer_reviews.text: bad bad bad i cant make it work i ask 3 guys to do they said the same thing. very bad quality always fall apart
customer_reviews.author: tucta

customer_reviews.title: THIS ONE WON'T be Cracking
customer_reviews.text: REALLY LOVE this wall rack... and this one won't split,,
customer_reviews.author: windancer101

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Should have known what I was getting into when it said Ikea
customer_reviews.author: gman

customer_reviews.title: Great wall organizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this for organizing our mail. It was also easy to put together - I just wish it came with screws.
customer_reviews.author: MelC

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Gorgeous. I used letter and number stickers to label for bills and filing. Looks great. A tiny bit tough to get apart (in order to) put together.
customer_reviews.author: swimn4fun

customer_reviews.title: Arrived fast and as described. I found the assembly ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast and as described. I found the assembly to be fairly simple but not for impatient people who want to just open the box and attach to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Get organized
customer_reviews.text: Great to keep track of the kids paperwork. Homework and school papers have a new place to hang
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Easy to assemble. Just perfect for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Scott

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: These were stuck together so tightly that we had to pry them apart with a tool. They were also bent from being stuck together so tightly. they worked for hanging up in our mud room for mail but the way hey were packaged was not impressive. They are very heavy metal and would have been an impressive item, had they been packaged and shipped better.
customer_reviews.author: Bfastattiffanys7

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kind of hard to put together but in the end it works
customer_reviews.author: Shannonb484

customer_reviews.title: and this is perfect for keeping our mail organized
customer_reviews.text: I live with 3 other people, and this is perfect for keeping our mail organized!!! :D
customer_reviews.author: Gab M

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy; not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my office. They look much nicer in the photos. They're basically sheet metal and flimsy. There are many "holes" in the bottom of each, so small pieces of paper like receipts will fall out. I would recommend something that doesn't have any openings on the bottom; these feel overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Greg in Longwood

customer_reviews.title: damaged
customer_reviews.text: This item was damaged in the packing process. They send them nested inside one another, unfortunately this causes the first one to become bent and scratched. It also requires the assistance of a bodybuilder to get all of the pieces"un-nested". So if you are considering this item for looks, it might not be worth the risk. As far as function, once I got it taken apart and assembled it does function ok. With the exception of the top bin, though, all the other bins aren't able to hold more than a spiral notebook because of the partially nested design.
customer_reviews.author: Professional seamstress

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and white. Is a bit heavy as it is metal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: The only negative is how hard it is to separate the bins. We used a screw driver to gently "walk" the pieces apart. The bins are easy to put together and hang on the wall. The strength is on par with wood bins, but about a 1/3 of the price. The white color blends nicely with our white walls.
customer_reviews.author: Computer Medics

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is definitely functional, just way smaller that what I thought it'd be. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: During assembly (which is surprising easy for an Ikea product) I was able to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Item had a dent in the bottom corner of one of the metal racks. During assembly (which is surprising easy for an Ikea product) I was able to put the dinged rack in the middle so that damage is not visible. It is very durable and is a great additional to help organize my office. Will buy again if I need more file racks. Great quality, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps everything I need at eye level, and works perfectly at my desk to store necessary materials. Well designed, too.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Way overpriced!
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 2 stars because once this was delivered, IKEA is only charging 16.99 for the same set. Double check prices this company is charging too much. Other than that, they are metal and IKEA quality. They can't be broke up unless there is brackets. So I have to make a trip to IKEA, which is what I was trying to avoid and the whole reason I used Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to seperate individual trays but works well once put together
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Underwood

customer_reviews.title: We put it in out dining room and it matches great with our white trim
customer_reviews.text: This really helped us organize the clutter that was on our table. We put it in out dining room and it matches great with our white trim. And now I have a place to put things that is close by instead of going back to the filing cabinet on the other side of the house. Plus now my wife knows where to put bills when the come in and I know exactly where to look for them. My wife has a label maker and we labeled some magnetic strips and put the labels on magnets so it is versatile if our filing habits need to change.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan J.

customer_reviews.title: This rack is great. Thank you--I will be ordering more
customer_reviews.text: This rack is great. Thank you--I will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: ELAINE O'HARA

customer_reviews.title: great wall file rack
customer_reviews.text: was exactly as i expected it to be. a little hard to get apart but once i did it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: jodi

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: These went together easily and the price was great. I would have given 5 stars if the metal was a little thicker. The metal seems a little flimsy but once it was mounted to the wall it wasn't too bad.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hang and use
customer_reviews.text: After a long search, we replaced our wall hanging file in our kitchen with this rack. We are very pleased with the results. Each section is separate and attaches to the one below it with tabs. It is well made and strong. Since it is our "office" in the kitchen, my husband attached a wooden shelf on the top for sticky papers and other such necessities. One of the benefits of the rack is that we didn't have to paint it to match the wall!
customer_reviews.author: teacherlady

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Like the color, blends in with the wall. Stays in place well, good quality. In between pockets are a little trim but useful overall.
customer_reviews.author: nikroh

customer_reviews.title: Ikea Kvissie Wall Magazine File Rack
customer_reviews.text: It was a well manufactured rack but it was too big for the area I needed it. I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Leona M. Ness

customer_reviews.title: decent product, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The racks were individually packed into each other so tightly, that I needed pliers to pull them apart. Not user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Banks

customer_reviews.title: does not stay together well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hang absent work in my classroom. It has a hard time staying together and staying on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Anastaisha Y.

customer_reviews.title: Functional but too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Trying to get organized and for that helpful. But they are metal and almost got a hernia trying to hang them on the wall by myself. Heavy plastic would be better. I am afraid to put something heavy (like mags) inside them or else the mollies will fail to hold it on the wall. Re-think this purchase if weight is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R. Arthur

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy. Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely fashion; very sturdy. Did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Modern, Modular File Holder
customer_reviews.text: Can not get enough of these for my offices. I have ordered many of these because of their quality, modern look and modular design.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L.

product_meta.title: Ikea Kvissle 5 Shelve Metal Wall Magazine File Rack, White
product_meta.description: Size:1 Pack, L: 18 " X W: 13 ½ " X D: 3 ½ "| Color:WhiteOn the wall or in the drawer – you decide. KVISSLE series takes care of all your different storage needs in and around the desk. The clean, crisp design works just as well at the office as at home.
